name: Ghoul Master
description:
You may be frail, but with the help of some fiendish friends, perhaps you can complete your dark quest!

In this game, you summon ghouls and command them to attack pesky knights while you explore and collect crystal shards.

Made as a game jam. Credits: Miles Äijälä @qwertyprophecy, Robin Swift @SwiftSketches, Tomas Beržinskas, and Alex Martin.
